30#ifndef CONFFILE_H_
31#define CONFFILE_H_ 1
32
33/* split routines */
34
35#include <sys/param.h>
36
37#include <stdio.h>
38#include <time.h>
39
40#include "defs.h"
41
42DEFINE_ARRAY(strv_t, char *);
43
44/* this struct describes a configuration file */
45typedef struct conffile_t {
46 FILE *fp; /* in-core file pointer */
47 char name[MAXPATHLEN]; /* name of file */
48 int lineno; /* current line number */
49 int readonly; /* nonzero if file is readonly */
50 const char *sep; /* set of separators */
51 const char *comment; /* set of comment characters */
52} conffile_t;
53
54/* this struct describes an entry in the configuration file */
55typedef struct ent_t {
56 char buf[BUFSIZ]; /* buffer with entry contents */
57 strv_t sv; /* split up string dynamic array */
58} ent_t;
59
60int conffile_open(conffile_t *, const char *, const char *, const char *, const char *);
61int conffile_split(conffile_t *, ent_t *, char *);
62int conffile_getent(conffile_t *, ent_t *);
63int conffile_get_by_field(conffile_t *, ent_t *, int, char *);
64int conffile_putent(conffile_t *, int, char *, char *);
65int conffile_get_lineno(conffile_t *);
66char *conffile_get_name(conffile_t *);
67void conffile_printent(ent_t *);
68void conffile_close(conffile_t *);
69
70#ifndef PREFIX
71#define PREFIX ""
72#endif
73
74#ifndef SYSCONFDIR
75#define SYSCONFDIR "/etc"
76#endif
77
78#define _PATH_ISCSI_ETC SYSCONFDIR "/iscsi/"
79
80#define _PATH_ISCSI_PASSWD PREFIX _PATH_ISCSI_ETC "auths"
81#define _PATH_ISCSI_TARGETS PREFIX _PATH_ISCSI_ETC "targets"
82#define _PATH_ISCSI_PID_FILE "/var/run/iscsi-target.pid"
83
84#endif
85
